text: haey chaur puok anak kom bietbien tropy sa mb tde kaunkamprea leuklengte tamvithi del meanobrayoch rhautadl ke penhvy . haey chaur puok anak bampenh rongveal ning kar thloeng brakabdaoy you tde thmr . yeung min dakbantouk bokkol na mneak aoy huosapi samotthaphap robsa ke laey . haey nowpel del puok anak niyeay sdei chaur brakean khchab nouv pheap you tde thmr saumbite teaktng nung sachsalohet kadaoy . haey chaur puok anak bampenh kechchasanyea robsa a l laoh . teangnih trong ban phdephdam vea champoh puok anak sangkhumtha puok anak nung changcham
